cause.description:
Basically, this is campaigning for Welsh rights. And for the rights of me to molest sheep. End of.
1. I want to do it. Any other reason needed?
2. People should be able to do it if they want
3. Sheep molestation isn't as bad as everyone makes it out to be
cause.mission: Give people the choice whether they molest animals or not
cause.name: Sheep Molestation is not a crime!
